Headline: #20 Madison Temporary Reroute near  Madison/Damen
ShortDescription: #20 Madison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near Madison/Damen.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#20 Madison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near Madison/Damen.

Westbound buses will operate via Madison, Ashland, Warren, Damen and Madison, then resume their normal route.

Eastbound buses will operate via Madison, Damen, Washington, Ashland and Madison, then resume their normal route.

Allow extra travel time.
